p.span:
The
Dallas Cowboys
also known as "America's Team" are one of the greatest teams in the history of the NFL. They have been Super Bowl Champions five times and have several Hall of Fame players as a result. The 20Yardline.com has put together our version of the All-Time Cowboys Team. Feel free to debate our selections in the forums or vote in our polls throughout the season.

strong.span:
FB -
Don Perkins
San Francisco 49ers #42 Ronnie Lott Black Throwback Jersey on sale,for Cheap,wholesale from China (1961-1968)

td.script:
var obj = SHARETHIS.addEntry({
title: "Dallas Cowboys All Time Team",
url: "http://www.20yardline.com/nfc-teams/dallas-cowboys/dallas-cowboys-all-time-team.html",
description: "",
content: "



 













 


Dallas Cowboys  All-Time Team 1960-Present








The Dallas Cowboys also known as "America's Team" are one of the greatest teams in the history of the NFL.  They have been Super Bowl Champions five times and have several Hall of Fame players as a result.  The 20Yardline.com has put together our version of the All-Time Cowboys Team.  Feel free to debate our selections in the forums or vote in our polls throughout the season.
  




Starting Offense:
QB - Roger Staubach (1969-1979)
RB - Emmitt Smith (1990-2002)
RB - Tony Dorsett (1977-1988)
FB - Don Perkins (1961-1968)
WR - Michael Irvin (1988-1999)
WR - Bob Hayes (1965-1974)
WR - Drew Pearson (1973-1983)
TE - Jason Witten (2003-Present)
TE - Jay Novacek (1990-1996)
OT - Erik Williams (1991-2000)
OG - Larry Allen (1994-2005)
OC - Mark Stepnoski (89-94, 99-01)
OG - John Niland (1966-1974)
OT - Rayfield Wright (1967-1979)


Starting Defense:
DE - "Too Tall" Jones (74-78, 80-89)
DT - Randy White (1975-1988)
DT - Bob Lilly (1961-1974)
DE - Harvey Martin (1973-1983)
LB - Chuck Howley (1961-1973)
LB - Ken Norton Jr. (1988-1993)
LB - Lee Roy Jordan (1963-1976)
LB - Demarcus Ware (2005-Present)
CB - Everson Walls (1981-1989)
CB - Mel Renfro (1964-1977)
DB - Deion Sanders (1995-1999)
DB - Darren Woodson (1992-2003)
S - Cliff Harris (1970-1979)
S - Charlie Waters (1970-78, 80-81)




 
Special Teams:
K - Rafael Septien (1978-1986)
P - Mike Saxon (1985-1992)
PR - Bob Hayes (1965-1974)
KR - Butch Johnson (1976-1983)
 
 
Head Coach:
Tom Landry (1960-1988)




 









 ",
updated: "2011-08-04 04:51:07"
}, {button: true}); 
var id = "sharethis_" + obj.idx;
var x = document.getElementById(id);
obj.attachButton(x);
